authoringenvironment.model

Interface IAuthoringActor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEditableGameElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor

    public interface IAuthoringActor
extends IEditableGameElement
    This interface defines the subset of Actor functionality that will be accessible to the game authoring environment. We decided to make a separate interface since the authoring environment has different functionality requirements.
    Author:
    blakekaplan
